description: Extended Docker commands bundle - advanced container and system operations

commands.title: Docker: Create network
commands.description: Create a new custom bridge network for container communication

commands.title: Docker: List networks
commands.description: List all Docker networks on the system

commands.title: Docker: Inspect network
commands.description: Show detailed information about a network including connected containers

commands.title: Docker: Connect container to network
commands.description: Attach a running container to a network

commands.title: Docker: Disconnect container from network
commands.description: Detach a container from a network

commands.title: Docker: Remove network
commands.description: Delete a custom network

commands.title: Docker: Create volume
commands.description: Create a named volume for persistent data storage

commands.title: Docker: List volumes
commands.description: List all Docker volumes on the system

commands.title: Docker: Inspect volume
commands.description: Show detailed information about a volume including mount path

commands.title: Docker: Remove volume
commands.description: Delete a named volume

commands.title: Docker: System disk usage
commands.description: Show Docker disk usage - images, containers, volumes breakdown

commands.title: Docker: System prune all
commands.description: Remove all unused images, containers, volumes, and networks

commands.title: Docker: Inspect container
commands.description: Show detailed information about a container including config and state

commands.title: Docker: Create image from container
commands.description: Create a new image from a modified container - useful for saving container state

commands.title: Docker: Save image to file
commands.description: Export Docker image to tar file for backup or transfer

commands.title: Docker: Load image from file
commands.description: Import Docker image from tar file

commands.title: Docker: Container resource usage
commands.description: Display CPU, memory, network, and block I/O stats for all containers

commands.title: Docker: Container stats for specific container
commands.description: Show live resource usage statistics for a specific container

commands.title: Docker: Check health status
commands.description: Check health status of a container with health checks configured

commands.title: Docker: View events
commands.description: Monitor real-time Docker events - use type=container, image, network, etc.

commands.title: Docker: Export container filesystem
commands.description: Export container filesystem to tar file

commands.title: Docker: Push image to registry
commands.description: Push Docker image to remote registry

commands.title: Docker: Pull image from registry
commands.description: Download Docker image from remote registry

commands.title: Docker: Tag image
commands.description: Create a new tag for an image pointing to existing image

commands.title: Docker: Rename container
commands.description: Rename a container

commands.title: Docker: Pause container
commands.description: Suspend processes in a running container without stopping it

commands.title: Docker: Unpause container
commands.description: Resume processes in a paused container
